module.name: Asterisk Logfiles
module.changelog: *2.5.0.2* #3645 *2.5.0.1* localization updates *2.5.0* #2776: filter out potentially bad html tags from log file *2.4.0* bumped for 2.4 *1.1.1* bump for rc1 *1.1.0* #1442 remove access problem and have log display in same window *1.0.2* #2070 fix proper use of script tags
